What a way to live @PHE_EoEngland Good quality of life having to tape your house up every night to stop landfill gases terrorising your home & making you ill? I think not - get with the program - close the landfill @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/FlwyfNP8k8

I have formally complained to the @EnvAgency that their inaction early on has led to harm to the health me personally and the community. And who is to say there won‚Äôt be longer term harm? @Cap_it_off Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/Yuiqq2DFO9

entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

tweets.text:
Perhaps sort out an environmental disaster in Newcastle under Lyme before taking on the world.  

Pollution spewing from #walleysquarry is over 40 times higher than an average landfill.  Look how close it is. 

#StopTheStink #EarthDay2021 https://t.co/tdT0R1HuVa https://t.co/vgPCRPKEJy

@Clive12077715 I bet its no suprise visit either they will have advanced notice i imagine @EnvAgencyMids needs looked into. Its diabolical how even the simplist of things are not communicated to the public

Following fuel theft from the Arriva bus depot in #Guildford, diesel has leaked into the #Wey. We are on site to minimise the effects of the spillage and are working to contain the spill by using oil booms. No reports of wildlife being affected https://t.co/6L3eEMi3Y5

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

tweets.text: Walley‚Äôs Quarry Landfill is the biggest issue facing @EnvAgency today in the UK. Our community are having to buy air purifiers just to sleep. Please sign the petition to help protect against landfills! #stopthestink https://t.co/2XW8dJUhKi https://t.co/rLdm0z74wW
@nadderdiary @EnvAgency Horrible planktonic algal bloom. Combination of low flows & high nutrient levels as water temp rising. It is not at all normal. It is the clearest symptom of a polluted river.

The @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA need to be held to account for allowing children‚Äôs (and everyone else‚Äôs) health to be harmed. Our most vulnerable dismissed and neglected for far too long. There will be a day of reckoning @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/Imtvi9TsHo

entity.name: The View
entity.description: Created in 1997 by veteran journalist Barbara Walters, "The View" is a daytime talk show hosted by women -- including Whoopi Goldberg, Joy Behar, Sunny Hostin, Meghan McCain and Sara Haines -- and each offers her take on the day's news during the opening "Hot Topics" segment. Later, the ladies welcome various celebrities, who join them in a chat or perform for the audience. The program also offers tips on beauty, fashion, diet and relationships. Known for their freewheeling style, the hosts are often lampooned in late-night sketches.
